txt.en:
'Have you heard of the Wardens of Annúminas? They are a branch of our order who guard the ancient tombs and ruins which mark the long-ago abandoned capital of Arnor.

'News has come to me that they stand hard-pressed, as bandits and refugees from the North Downs have begun to loot the old tombs in increasing numbers, and darker rumours of the presence of Angmarim agents who seek entrance into the ancient city itself.

'Travel to the camp of Tinnudir and you will find Cannuion, who will be most grateful for any aid you can render.'

'You have been sent by Arohir? Good, we have great need of trustworthy warriors to help us against the growing threat of robbers and the like that have grown up in recent months here - for we are few, and it threatens to overwhelm us.'
'Speak with Cannuion at Tinnudír on the banks of Lake Evendim, [placeholder].'
Arohir of Esteldín has bade you seek the camp of Tinnudir along the eastern shore of Lake Evendim, and once there to speak with Cannuion.
Cannuion is at the Ranger-camp at Tinnudir, in Evendim, to the west of the North Downs.\n\nArohir has sent you to speak with Cannuion in Evendim.
